Computer.name: Striker_Battlestation
Computer.file: Can't tell if it is going to be easier to just break into the grades server at uni and write in what I want, or actually do the assignments. That answer is clearly more fun, but, ugh, that thing's a fortress. Starting to think that hacking in your results for a cyber security degree is kinda of backwards...
